responses.Why should you not use the same password: Some accounts are not important, so reuse is okay

Why should you not use the same password.answer: Some accounts are not important, so reuse is okay

What does a password saving app do?.answer: Keeps and locks your passwords safely

Why is it risky to use personal info lik.answer: Hackers can find it on social media

Which of these actions increases your pa.answer: Writing passwords on sticky notes near your computer
